Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Incorporate Open XML Power Tools in base SDK" (#599) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Is this a:
- [ ] Issue with the OpenXml library
- [X] Question on library usage


**Open XML Power tool features in base SDK**

Open XML Power tools had perfect tools that is was very helpful but, Microsoft decided to kill that product. Is it any plan to incorporate that functionality in this SDK ? and support them/

It would be really nice to be.

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Ready particle validation infrastructure for Sdb removal" (#602) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
In order to remove Sdb related infrastructure, we first need to clean up a number of issues within the particle validator infrastructure. This includes:

- Remove usage of ElementId and use the Type object instead
- Fix hierarchy of particles (ie ElementType should only be on ElementParticle)
- Add tests for all particles to ensure future changes are not unexpected
- Make the particles read only if possible
